name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course will provide an introduction to the basics of astronomy and astrophysics, including cosmology, the solar system, galaxies, and stellar and galactic evolution.

name: Planetary Science
description: This course will provide an overview of the history and current state of the field of Planetary Science. Topics covered will include the formation of the Solar System, the composition of planets and moons, and the exploration of planets and moons.

name: Planetary Dynamics
description: This course will cover the mathematical principles that govern the motion and evolution of the Solar System, including the orbital dynamics of planets, moons, asteroids, comets, and meteoroids.

name: Planetary Geology
description: This course will cover the geology of the Solar System, including the study of the formation, composition, structures, and evolution of planets and moons.
